description:
I colorized, restored, and created a sound design for this video of Marseille, France in the 1918-1919, you'll witness the vibrant life of Marseille over a century ago. The bustling streets are filled with scenes of boutique shops and store displays, showcasing daily commerce. Streetcars glide through the lively districts, while the port is a hub of maritime transport

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: Musée départemental Albert-Kahn dans le département des Hauts-de-Seine (Le Saint, Lucien)


Albert Kahn, born Abraham Kahn in Marmoutier, Alsace, on March 3, 18
title: Marseille 1910s in color, Post World War I [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
